clinical_study.brief_title: Lung Ultrasonography vs Fiberoptic Bronchoscopy for Aiding Lung Collapse in Patient Using Double Lumen Tube
clinical_study.official_title: Comparing Lung Ultrasonography and Fiberoptic Bronchoscopy for Aiding Lung Collapse in Patient Using Double Lumen Tube. A Randomized Controlled Study.

brief_summary.textblock: The study contain result from comparison of diagnostic result about lung collapsibility by using lung ultrasonography as intervention compare to fiberoptic bronchoscopy as gold standard

detailed_description.textblock: This study demonstrate diagnostic study compare lung ultrasonography and fiberoptic bronchoscopy as gold standard,which is surgeon grading. The protocol was performed in randomized controlled trial whether the subject was allocated to ultrasonography group or fiberoptic bronchoscopy group.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patient of lung collapse in ultrasonography and fiberoptic bronchoscopy
primary_outcome.description: Compare number of patient with lung collapse detected by ultrasonography and fiberoptic bronchoscopy in patient with double lumen tube by report as specificity and sensitivity of detection of lung collapse by compare to visual grading of lung collapse by surgeon

secondary_outcome.description: Time point from evaluation of lung collapse by each test to time point of grading lung collapse by gold standard( visual grading of lung collapse by surgeon)

secondary_outcome.measure: Accuracy of detection of lung collapse in ultrasonography method in cardiovascular and thoracic anesthesia fellow
secondary_outcome.description: Accuracy of detection of lung collapse in thoracic patient with lung ultrasonography in cardiac and thoracic anesthesia fellow and cardiac anaesthesiologist after training lung ultrasonography

arm_group.description: Patient in this group receive lung ultrasonography to detect lung collapse after insert double lumen tube and finally compare lung collapse by surgeon's visual grading scale of lung collapse when enter pleural cavity.

Patient in this group receive fiberoptic bronchoscope to detect lung collapse after insert double lumen tube and finally compare lung collapse by surgeon's visual grading scale of lung collapse when enter pleural cavity.

intervention.description: Use ultrasound image of lung at upper and lower lobe to detect lung collapse and compare grading of lung collapse by surgeon as gold standard

intervention.intervention_name: Fiberoptic bronchoscopy for double lumen tube's position
intervention.description: Use fiberoptic bronchoscope via double lumen tube to detect optimum position of double lumen tube and record grading of lung collapse by surgeon as gold standard

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult patients, age â‰¥18 years old
- American Society of Anesthesiologists(ASA) physical status classification I - III
- Scheduled for elective thoracic surgery which require One lung ventilation(OLV) with Left-sided double lumen tube
Exclusion Criteria:
- Anticipated difficult intubation or with tracheostomy tube
- Patient with pneumothorax, pleural effusion, emphysema or past history of pleurodesis
- Patient with deranges pulmonary function test (out of forced expiration volume in 1 s, total lung capacity, forced vital capacity <50% of the predicted values)
- Patient refuses to participate.
